description: The Hoodoo Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Hoodoo Ski Area for the snow report
Alexa, ask Hoodoo Ski Area for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Hoodoo Ski Area
shortDescription: The Hoodoo Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Hoodoo Ski Area.
